query.statement:
SELECT '0' AS CHECK ,A.PSPID ,B.ZSITE_NM ,INTEGER(B.ZQNTY) AS ZQNTY ,C.POSID_1 AS POSID ,C.ZZSHIP1 ,C.POSID_OLD ,RTRIM(C.POSID_DONG) AS POSID_DONG ,(CASE WHEN A.U_PDF = 'TRUE' OR A.U_PDF = 'true' THEN 'O' ELSE '' END) AS U_PDF , (CASE WHEN C.ZZGUBUN = '10' THEN 'µ¿' ELSE '' END ) DFCHAR , A.UFDATE , D.UKEY , '' AS TEMP , '' AS TEMP_POSID , '' AS SEQ , '' AS FLG FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTPDF AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.POSID = C.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTDONG AS D ON C.MANDT = D.MANDT AND C.POSID = D.PSPID AND C.POSID_1 = D.POSID WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND B.ZQNTY >= 3 -- AND C.POSID_DONG = '' AND C.ZZGUBUN IN ('10','11') AND C.TXT04 <> 'C' AND (A.CATE IN ('', 'L') OR A.CATE IS NULL) AND A.PSPID IN ( SELECT X1.POSID FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.POSID = X2.POSID WHERE X1.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X1.POSID = A.PSPID AND X2.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND X2.ZQNTY >= 3 AND X1.ZZGUBUN IN ('10','11') AND X1.TXT04 <> 'C' AND X1.POSID_DONG = '' WITH UR )
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
--AND C.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT# AND A.UFDATE BETWEEN #UF_FROM_DT# AND #UF_TO_DT#
order by A.PSPID, C.POSID_1
WITH UR
